scripts.extract:panels: for f in assets/pizarro/*.avif; do bun run panelExtractor/src/index.ts "$f" -o "${f%.avif}.json"; done
scripts.extract:bubbles: for f in assets/pizarro/*.avif; do (cd bubbleExtractor && uv run python extract.py "../$f" --output-dir ../assets/pizarro --no-visualize); done
scripts.extract:all: bun run extract:panels && bun run extract:bubbles
scripts.build: bun run extract:all && bun run generate
